company_philosophy: Our Company doesn't believe in "one size fits all." We match the specific chemical to the substrate to ensure a deep clean to restore value of your property.

restorative_agents.name: Sodium Hypochlorite (Commercial Bleach)
restorative_agents.description: We use this to sanitize surfaces and completely eliminate organic growth like algae, mold, and mildew at the source.

restorative_agents.name: Sodium Hydroxide (Heavy Duty Degreaser)
restorative_agents.description: Our go-to for breaking down stubborn oils, grease, and animal fats on high-traffic surfaces like driveways and dumpster pads.

restorative_agents.name: Oxalic Acid
restorative_agents.description: We utilize this specialized acid to safely lift orange rust stains caused by well-water irrigation or metal furniture.

wood_and_specialty: Sodium Metasilicate: A powerful cleaner and stripper we use on weathered decks to remove old stains and deep-seated grime.
Sodium Percarbonate (Oxygen Bleach): A gentle, eco-friendly wood cleaner that kills mold and brightens wood fibers without the harshness of standard bleach.
Butyl Degreaser: We use this specifically to remove "tiger stripes"—those stubborn black streaks on gutters caused by asphalt shingle runoff.
Citrus & Purple Degreasers: Specialized solvents we employ to target rubber tire marks and deep engine oil stains.
masonry_and_commercial: F9 Efflo: Our gold-standard treatment for removing efflorescence (white mineral powder) and calcium deposits from brick and stone.
EBC (Enviro Bio Cleaner): A biodegradable, multi-purpose powerhouse we mix with our house wash to provide superior cling and grease-cutting capabilities.
Gold Assassin: A specialized high-alkaline cleaner we reserve for the toughest restaurant grease and "kitchen-to-curb" sanitization.
safety_and_protection_products: Elemonator (Surfactant): A high-cling soap we add to our mixtures to increase "dwell time" on your siding, ensuring the chemicals work effectively before being rinsed away.
Bleach Neutralizer: We spray this on all surrounding plants and grass after our cleaning process to neutralize any residual salts and protect your landscaping.
F9 BARC (Battery Acid Restoration Cleaner): F9 BARC is the industry king for "orange battery acid" stains. If your surface has a golf cart or a car battery acid stains this will work effectively.
Citric Acid (Professional Wood Brightener): The second step for washing wood after Sodium metasilicate. The Citric Acid adds the proper PH back into the wood.
industrial_hardware: Simpson ALH 4240: 4.0 GPM Commercial Grade Pressure Washer.
WOJET 18” Pressure Washer Surface Cleaner: Professional attachment with 4500 PSI capacity.
YAMATIC Non-Marking Hose: 3/8" Pressure Washer Hose, 100FT, 4200 PSI, Rubber Steel Braided, Wear Resistant, Industry Grade for Hot/Cold water.
